subject: p19159236
Findings: There lungs are low in volume but without focal consolidation. Diffuse opacities likely reflect mild pulmonary edema. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The cardiac size and cardiac silhouette are obscured by low lung volumes. The mediastinal and hilar contours appear unremarkable.
Impression: Mild pulmonary edema. Repeat imaging after diuresis is recommended to evaluate for concomitant pneumonia.
